title: The Decade In Science
description: As 2019 draws to a close, we enlisted the help of two NPR science correspondents — Nell Greenfieldboye and Joe Palca — to look back on some of the biggest science stories of the past 10 years. Follow host Maddie Sofia on twitter @maddie_sofia. Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: The Decade In Science
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: It's a long time for a short podcast, but we tried!
itunes:subtitle: It's a long time for a short podcast, but we tried!
content:encoded: As 2019 draws to a close, we enlisted the help of two NPR science correspondents — Nell Greenfieldboye and Joe Palca — to look back on some of the biggest science stories of the past 10 years. Follow host Maddie Sofia on twitter @maddie_sofia. Email the show at shortwave@npr.org.
